description:
The National Games start. Sai fights the first match of the Games. Shu and Athena fight in the second match.
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Kyouteki ga Ippai! Akogare no Zenkokutaikai
Les jeux nationaux, de nombreux adversaires.
Lots of Formidable Opponents! The Much Anticipated National Tournament
Muitos Oponentes Formidáveis! A Grandeza Do Torneio Nacional!
Viele starke Gegner! Die Landesmeisterschaft beginnt
強敵がいっぱい! あこがれの全国大会
